definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Charles Grey (1764-1845), prime minister of the United Kingdom 1830-34

pinyin: Cha2 er3 si1 · Di2 geng1 si1

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯当选为先生市教育委员会主任委员。

sentences.english: While Charles was in prison, Sydney Carton had also arrived in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 当查尔斯在坐牢时，悉尼卡尔登也来到了巴黎。

sentences.english: Charles, and Marcee cannot coexist with Alicia.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯和玛希不能和艾丽西娅同时出现。

sentences.english: She was the first wife of HRH The Prince Charles, Prince of Wales.
sentences.chinese: 她是威尔士王子查尔斯的第一任妻子。
你知道查尔斯巴贝奇吗？

sentences.english: I have obtained the favour that the bearer has a short note from Charles to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 已蒙批准让送信人给查尔斯之妻带去一便条。

sentences.english: Every day from 5 to 7 pm, we go out and row on the Charles River.
sentences.chinese: 每天傍晚五点到七点，我们都会去查尔斯河上划赛艇。

sentences.english: Charles finally acceded to the Petition in June 1628.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯最后于1628年六月同意了请愿法。

sentences.english: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentences.chinese: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

sentences.english: The company will perform the work in Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 该公司将在查尔斯顿进行工作。

sentences.english: B. Charles. Address?15 Arnold Road, in Middletown.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯。地址？中镇，阿诺德路15号。

sentences.english: Dressing the part on a tour of the Rainforest area of Tacantins State, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在巴西塔康地区的热带丛林旅行中的装扮。

sentences.english: The side-by-side is the first step to master when dancing the Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 侧的侧是第一步跳舞时掌握的查尔斯顿。

sentences.english: The doctor advised Charles to cut down on his drinking.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议查尔斯少喝点酒。

sentences.english: H. Huxley and Charles Lyell, insisted the age of the Earth must be in the hundreds of millions.
sentences.chinese: 赫胥黎和查尔斯莱尔则更坚持地球一定有上亿岁了。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
